location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to John Kaye, Accountant General, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is enclosing the first of three sets of bills (not present) on the Military Paymaster for disbursements on the account of the Marine Guard at the Bushire Residency. It is also enclosing two sets of bills (also not present) on the Marine Paymaster for the salary of Stephen Watson Henshaw, the Marine Agent.
